item.title: Self-host AI model in the browser
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Deploy an AI model directly in the browser for applications like OCR for security cameras or private browser chatbots. Research and select suitable AI models for the intended applications. Use WASM to integrate the models into a browser environment, ensuring privacy and efficiency.
